title: Anton Meier Ebsen Jørgensen – Resources & Downloads
description: Free resources and downloads: Excel templates, code, notes, and guides.

hero.title: Downloads & Templates
hero.text: Small, practical resources I use myself: templates, cheat sheets, and examples. Everything is made to be plug-and-play.

note.title: Note
note.text1: Some files may be 'sanitized' (data/names removed) due to course/confidentiality.
note.text2: Do you have a specific need? Write me — I can often create a template that fits.

downloads.title: Downloads
downloads.text: Place files in the assets/downloads/ folder and link them here.

cta.title: Need something specific?
cta.text: If you tell me your format (Excel/Python/SAS) and goal (e.g., forecasting, dashboards, data-cleaning), I can suggest a template structure that fits.
